title: Quantum hypnosis, Mesmerism & Non-verbal Hypnotic Induction (2) / Dr. Marco Paret's masterclass
description:
This is the second part of this video. The previous one, you can watch here: https://youtu.be/Vt_8023gxc4 Dr. Marco Paret used Fascination - the power of the gaze and Quantum hypnosis elements on one of his student. She entered in a deep trance of charm and couldn't stop following him, because she was magnetized by his gaze. She felt unique during this non-verbal hypnosis experience. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
